notes:
### v1.5.10
#### NEW FEATURES
- added new log statistics for shields (settings > general > shields tab)

![image](https://github.com/snoww/loa-logs/assets/33789437/3ffe3f4f-12d9-4bae-8ede-5619b633bc73)

- improved start minimized option
- improved search, no longer updates on each keystroke
- normalized support buffs to always be in same order
  - **brand** > **atk. buff** > **identity**

![image](https://github.com/snoww/loa-logs/assets/33789437/d2b4b99a-93e7-4d01-9f31-fa723a2610d9)

- logs window will show up when new update is available regardless of setting
- added update notification to live meter
- added boss move log chart

#### BUG FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS
- fixed rare case where receiving a malformed packet would crash meter
- removed brel g6 7x meteors counting as boss
- reduced minimum height of meter window

thanks to [@yamiM0NSTER](https://github.com/yamiM0NSTER) for the contributions

full patch notes on [github](https://github.com/snoww/loa-logs/releases/latest)

send bug reports/suggestions to [#loa-logs](https://discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5)
